metadata.description: To hold the link to the Shift Planner mobile app

parameters.fetchXml:
<fetch mapping="logical" count="50" version="1.0">
  <entity name="systemuser">
    <attribute name="fullname" />
    <attribute name="domainname" />
    <attribute name="internalemailaddress" />
    <attribute name="title" />
    <link-entity name="systemuserroles" from="systemuserid" to="systemuserid">
      <link-entity name="role" from="roleid" to="roleid">
        <filter>
          <condition attribute="name" operator="eq" value='Shift Planner - Shift Administrator' />
        </filter>
      </link-entity>
    </link-entity>
  </entity>
</fetch>

parameters.$filter: mpa_name eq 'Swap Shift Request to Shift Admin'

Parse_email_body.inputs:
@replace(
    replace(
        replace(
            replace(
                replace(
                    replace(
                        replace(
                            replace(
                                replace(
                                    body('Email_Template_Body_Html_to_text'),
                                    '[Position]', 
                                    outputs('Select_from_Team_Position')?['body/_mpa_role_value@OData.Community.Display.V1.FormattedValue']
                                ),
                                '[Resource]', 
                                outputs('Select_related_shift_booking_record')?['body/_mpa_resource_value@OData.Community.Display.V1.FormattedValue']
                            ),
                            '[Date]', 
                            outputs('Select_related_shift_booking_record')?['body/mpa_date@OData.Community.Display.V1.FormattedValue']
                        ),
                        '[Reason]', 
                        outputs('Filter_change_request_by_ID')?['body/mpa_reason']
                    ),
                    '[Zone]', 
                    outputs('Select_related_shift_booking_record')?['body/_mpa_zone_value@OData.Community.Display.V1.FormattedValue']
                ),
                '[Shift Type]', 
                outputs('Select_from_Shift_Team')?['body/mpa_shifttype/mpa_name']
            ),
            '[Start Time]', 
            formatDateTime(outputs('Select_from_Shift_Team')?['body/mpa_shifttype/mpa_startdate'], 'h:mm tt')
        ),
        '[End Time]', 
        formatDateTime(outputs('Select_from_Shift_Team')?['body/mpa_shifttype/mpa_enddate'], 'h:mm tt')
    ),
    '[Team]', 
    outputs('Select_from_Team_Position')?['body/_mpa_shiftteam_value@OData.Community.Display.V1.FormattedValue']
)
